Colors

Custom graphite colors

Graphite dark - #394346 Graphite - #505e62 Graphite light - #7c8c94 Graphite grayish blue - #d3d6db Graphite lighter - #ebeeef Graphite lightest - #f6f8f9

Brand colors

Brand primary - #09acf8 Brand success - #48C248 Brand info - #31e3ff Brand warning - #f0ad4e Brand danger - #ff002d

Custom brand muted colors

Brand primary muted - #c3e9fe Brand success muted - #8fddc6 Brand info muted - #c3ebfd Brand danger muted - #d69a98
